forum.content:
Better Life and Have A Boyfriend is not just about sex ..
Is about how you spend time together..
How You can accept each other ..
And You Promise each other to be forever and Have a Happy Family ..
How You Now Each Other in Bad Or Good We Are ..
How You and Me Will Be Us ..
Love is about How You can Be YourSelf ..
And Believe Everyone will accept you when You Be YourSelf ..
Have A Nice Weekend Guys ..
God Bless You ..
forum.title: Love is not just sex
